aima.core.environment.wumpusworld.action

Class Shoot

  • java.lang.Object
    • aima.core.agent.impl.ObjectWithDynamicAttributes
      • aima.core.agent.impl.DynamicAction
        • aima.core.environment.wumpusworld.action.Shoot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Action

    public class Shoot
extends DynamicAction
    Artificial Intelligence A Modern Approach (3rd Edition): page 237.

    The action Shoot can be used to fire an arrow in a straight line in the direction the agent is facing. The arrow continues until it either hits (and hence kills) the wumpus or hits a wall. The agent has only one arrow, so only the first Shoot action has any effect.
    Author:
    Federico Baron, Alessandro Daniele, Ciaran O'Reilly
